msItem.title: Haqiqat i bina wa 'uruj i daulat i Rajah-hayi Satarah.
msItem.note: Flyleaf, recto: a) ...? Rajahs of Sattarra. b) At bottom left: D. Folio one, recto: a) In red: Haqiqat i bina wa 'uruj i Rajah-ha-yi Satara. b) Rise & Progress of the Rajas of Sittarre. Bound with Codrington/Reade No 69 (1). The fourth of the tracts in the volume. A short history of the Rajahs of Satarah. Rubricated punctuation.
msItem.incipit: Dar zamanah i sabiq Rajah i Udaypur ki bi Rana mashhur ast

listBibl.bibl: vStorey, i, p. 765. (But not in the index to Storey).
This and Codrington/Reade No 69 (5) are the only examples in Storey.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
